name: MathCreator
description:
Hi All!

This game is the first official version of MathCreator. It is a game focused on making practicing your basic arithmetic a bit more fun. Come and finish all three levels of this version OR challenge yourself with the high scorer and see what it the highest score you can get for Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication and/or Division. This was developed during the Capstone Fifth Coursera Course from MSU. 

Please leave a comment or suggestion. You will make my day :-)
